title: Greenbelt Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar             Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 10 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Greenbelt Park Junior Ranger Tuesdays- Volunteer in the Campground      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Greenbelt Park Ranger Station     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Celebrate the 100th Birthday of the National Park Service by helping us improve the campground View Details      Greenbelt Park Mt Velo Practice Bicycle Races      Time: 6:00 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Greenbelt Park     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 05/04/2016 to 08/24/2016 Watch the tour de france style Bike races in Greenbelt Park View Details      Greenbelt Park Campfire Program- Beaver, Raccoons, and White Tailed Deer      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Campfire Circle     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Join us for a campfire featuring the animals of Greenbelt Park.  View Details      Greenbelt Park Nature and Fitness Walk      Time: 10:00 AM to 10:45 AM Location: Sweetgum Picnic Area Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join a park ranger on a one mile nature walk. View Details      Greenbelt Park Prince Georges County Running Club      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Sweetgum Picnic Area     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 11/28/2015 to 12/17/2016 Come join your fellow runners and enjoy a run in the park. View Details      Greenbelt Park Volunteer Trail Crew      Time: 8:45 AM to 12:15 PM Location: Ranger Station near the campground     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Come and join the Volunteer trail crew and improve our trails throughout the park. View Details      Greenbelt Park Campfire Program - How the US Army helped National Parks      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Campfire Circle in B Loop Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 23, 2016 Come discover how the US Army helped the early years of National Parks. View Details      Greenbelt Park Camouflage: A Military adaptation from Nature      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Greenbelt Park Ranger station near the campground Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Camouflage is used by animals and the military as protection from their predators. View Details      Greenbelt Park Campfire program- Welcome to Washington, D.C.       Time: 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Ranger Station near the campground Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 30, 2016 Join a park ranger to learn about special historical and cultural points of interest in our nation's capital. View Details      Greenbelt Park Invasive Plant Removal      Time: 11:00 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Sweetgum Picnic Area     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Every 1st Saturday of every month. from 08/01/2015 to 12/03/2016 Come help preserve Greenbelt Park for future generations View Details
